languages.text: {n}Пилот в мятой униформе, украшенной гербом фон Валанциус, все еще бледна. На белых ладонях алеют отметины от штурвала. Вы помните ее испуганный вопль, раздавшийся, когда снаряд пролетел совсем рядом с вашим шаттлом.{/n}

{n}The pilot dressed in a crumpled uniform adorned with the von Valancius coat of arms still looks quite pale. Her white hands bear red marks left by the wheel. The scream of terror she let out when the missile flew right past your shuttle is etched in your memory.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Пилот в мятой униформе, украшенной гербом фон Валанциус, все еще бледна. На белых ладонях алеют отметины от штурвала. Вы помните ее испуганный вопль, раздавшийся, когда снаряд пролетел совсем рядом с вашим шаттлом.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}The pilot dressed in a worn uniform adorned with the von Valancius crest still looks quite pale. His white hands bear red marks left by the wheel. You remember the terrified scream he let out when that shell flew right past your shuttle.{/n}

{n}The pilot dressed in a worn uniform adorned with the von Valancius crest still looks quite pale. His white hands bear red marks left by the wheel. You remember the terrified scream he let out when that shell flew right past your shuttle.{/n}

{n}The pilot dressed in a crumpled uniform adorned with the von Valancius coat of arms still looks quite pale. Her white hands bear red marks left by the helm. The scream of terror she let out when that missile flew right past your shuttle is etched in your memory.{/n}

{n}The pilot dressed in a crumpled uniform adorned with the von Valancius coat of arms still looks quite pale. Her white hands bear red marks left by the helm. The scream of terror she let out when that missile flew right past your shuttle is etched in your memory.{/n}

{n}The pilot dressed in a crumpled uniform adorned with the von Valancius coat of arms still looks quite pale. Her white hands bear red marks left by the wheel. The scream of terror she let out when the missile flew right past your shuttle is etched in your memory.{/n}

{n}The pilot dressed in a crumpled uniform adorned with the von Valancius coat of arms still looks quite pale. Her white hands bear red marks left by the wheel. The scream of terror she let out when the missile flew right past your shuttle is etched in your memory.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Die Pilotin in einer zerknitterten Uniform mit dem Wappen der Familie von Valancius sieht immer noch sehr blass aus. Das Ruder hat auf ihren weißen Händen rote Spuren hinterlassen. Der Angstschrei, den sie ausgestoßen hat, als die Rakete direkt an deinem Shuttle vorbeigeflogen ist, hat sich dir ins Gedächtnis eingebrannt.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The pilot dressed in a crumpled uniform adorned with the von Valancius coat of arms still looks quite pale. Her white hands bear red marks left by the wheel. The scream of terror she let out when the missile flew right past your shuttle is etched in your memory.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Die Pilotin in einer zerknitterten Uniform mit dem Wappen der Familie von Valancius sieht immer noch sehr blass aus. Das Ruder hat auf ihren weißen Händen rote Spuren hinterlassen. Der Angstschrei, den sie ausgestoßen hat, als die Rakete direkt an deinem Shuttle vorbeigeflogen ist, hat sich dir ins Gedächtnis eingebrannt.{/n}

languages.text: {n}La pilote en uniforme froissé et orné des armoiries des von Valancius affiche un visage encore pâle. Ses mains blêmes portent des marques rouges laissées par le gouvernail. Le hurlement de terreur qu'elle a poussé quand le missile a frôlé votre navette reste gravé dans votre mémoire.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The pilot dressed in a crumpled uniform adorned with the von Valancius coat of arms still looks quite pale. Her white hands bear red marks left by the wheel. The scream of terror she let out when the missile flew right past your shuttle is etched in your memory.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}La pilote en uniforme froissé et orné des armoiries des von Valancius, affiche un visage encore pâle. Ses mains blêmes portent des marques rouges laissées par son casque. Le hurlement de terreur qu'elle a poussé quand le missile est passé au-dessus de votre navette reste gravé dans votre mémoire.{/n}

languages.text: {n}飞行员穿着皱巴巴的制服，上面饰有冯·瓦兰修斯家族的徽记。她的脸色仍然非常苍白，洁白的双手上留着掌舵时留下的红色印记。当那枚炮弹掠过你的穿梭机时，她发出的那声恐怖尖叫牢牢刻在了你的记忆中。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The pilot dressed in a crumpled uniform adorned with the von Valancius coat of arms still looks quite pale. Her white hands bear red marks left by the wheel. The scream of terror she let out when the missile flew right past your shuttle is etched in your memory.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}飞行员穿着皱巴巴的制服，上面饰有冯·瓦兰修斯家族的徽记。她的脸色仍然非常苍白，洁白的双手上留着掌舵时留下的红色印记。当那枚炮弹掠过你的穿梭机时，她发出的那声恐怖尖叫牢牢刻在了你的记忆中。{/n}

languages.text: {n}操縦士はフォン・ヴァランシウスの紋章があしらわれたシワクチャの制服を着ていて、未だにその顔色は青白い。白い手には、舵でついた赤くなった跡があった。ミサイルがシャトルの真横を通り過ぎた際に聞こえた彼女の恐怖の悲鳴が記憶に刻まれている。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The pilot dressed in a crumpled uniform adorned with the von Valancius coat of arms still looks quite pale. Her white hands bear red marks left by the wheel. The scream of terror she let out when the missile flew right past your shuttle is etched in your memory.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}操縦士はフォン・ヴァランシウスの紋章があしらわれたシワクチャの制服を着ていて、未だにその顔色は青白い。白い手には、舵でついた赤くなった跡があった。ミサイルがシャトルの真横を通り過ぎた際に聞こえた彼女の恐怖の悲鳴が記憶に刻まれている。{/n}

languages.text: {n}La piloto vestida con un uniforme arrugado adornado con el escudo de armas de von Valancius sigue bastante pálida. Sus manos blancas llevan marcas rojas causadas por el timón. El grito de terror que soltó cuando ese misil pasó volando junto a su lanzadera no se le olvidará jamás.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The pilot dressed in a crumpled uniform adorned with the von Valancius coat of arms still looks quite pale. Her white hands bear red marks left by the wheel. The scream of terror she let out when the missile flew right past your shuttle is etched in your memory.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}La piloto vestida con un uniforme arrugado adornado con el escudo de armas de von Valancius sigue bastante pálida. Sus manos blancas llevan marcas rojas causadas por el casco. El grito de terror que soltó cuando ese misil pasó volando junto a su lanzadera no se le olvidará jamás.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Von Valancius arması işlenmiş buruşuk bir üniforma giyen pilot, hâlâ oldukça solgun görünüyor. Beyaz ellerinde dümenin bıraktığı kırmızı izler var. Füze, mekiğinizi teğet geçerken kadının attığı dehşet çığlığı hafızana kazınmış durumda.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The pilot dressed in a crumpled uniform adorned with the von Valancius coat of arms still looks quite pale. Her white hands bear red marks left by the wheel. The scream of terror she let out when the missile flew right past your shuttle is etched in your memory.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Von Valancius arması işlenmiş buruşuk bir üniforma giyen pilot, hâlâ oldukça solgun görünüyor. Beyaz ellerinde dümenin bıraktığı kırmızı izler var. Füze, mekiğinizi teğet geçerken kadının attığı dehşet çığlığı hafızana kazınmış durumda.{/n}
